node_id.description: Node ID of the workflow run.

head_branch.description: The branch associated with the head commit.

path.description: The path where the workflow file is located.

display_title.description: Title to display for the workflow run.

run_number.description: The unique number assigned to the workflow run.

event.description: The event that triggered the workflow run.

status.description: The current status of the workflow run.

conclusion.description: The outcome or result of the workflow run.

workflow_id.description: ID of the workflow associated with the run.

check_suite_id.description: ID of the associated GitHub check suite.

check_suite_node_id.description: Node ID of the associated GitHub check suite.

url.description: URL to access details of the workflow run.

html_url.description: URL to view the workflow run on GitHub.

pull_requests.description: List of all pull requests associated with the workflow run.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the workflow run was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the workflow run was last updated.

run_attempt.description: Specifies the attempt number of the workflow run.

referenced_workflows.description: List of workflows referenced by the workflow runs

path.description: Path of the referenced workflow file

sha.description: SHA hash of the referenced workflow

ref.description: Type of reference to the workflow

run_started_at.description: The timestamp when the workflow run started.

jobs_url.description: URL to access jobs associated with the workflow run.

logs_url.description: URL to access logs generated by the workflow run.

check_suite_url.description: URL to access the check suite details.

artifacts_url.description: URL to access artifacts generated by the workflow run.

cancel_url.description: URL to cancel the workflow run if supported.

previous_attempt_url.description: URL to access the previous attempt of the workflow run.

workflow_url.description: URL to access details of the workflow.

head_commit.description: Details about the commit associated with the workflow run.

tree_id.description: ID of the tree associated with the head commit.

message.description: The commit message of the head commit.

author.description: The author details of the head commit.

committer.description: The committer details of the head commit.

repository.description: Details about the repository where the workflow run is executed.

private.description: Indicates if the repository is private.

fork.description: Indicates if the repository is a fork.

forks_url.description: URL to access forks of the repository.

keys_url.description: URL to access keys of the repository.

collaborators_url.description: URL to access collaborators of the repository.

teams_url.description: URL to access teams in the repository.

hooks_url.description: URL to access hooks in the repository.

issue_events_url.description: URL to access issue events in the repository.

events_url.description: URL to access events associated with the repository.

assignees_url.description: URL to access assignees of the repository.

branches_url.description: URL to access branches of the repository.

tags_url.description: URL to access tags in the repository.

blobs_url.description: URL to access blobs in the repository.

git_tags_url.description: URL to access git tags in the repository.

git_refs_url.description: URL to access git refs in the repository.

trees_url.description: URL to access trees in the repository.

statuses_url.description: URL to access commit statuses in the repository.

languages_url.description: URL to access languages used in the repository.

stargazers_url.description: URL to access stargazers of the repository.

contributors_url.description: URL to access contributors of the repository.

subscribers_url.description: URL to access subscribers of the repository.

subscription_url.description: URL for subscription to the repository.

commits_url.description: URL to access commits in the repository.

git_commits_url.description: URL to access git commits in the repository.

comments_url.description: URL to access comments in the repository.

issue_comment_url.description: URL to access issue comments in the repository.

contents_url.description: URL to access contents of the repository.

compare_url.description: URL to compare the repository with another ref/commit.

merges_url.description: URL to access merges in the repository.

archive_url.description: URL to access the repository's archive.

downloads_url.description: URL to access downloads in the repository.

issues_url.description: URL to access issues in the repository.

pulls_url.description: URL to access pulls in the repository.

milestones_url.description: URL to access milestones in the repository.

notifications_url.description: URL to access notifications in the repository.

labels_url.description: URL to access labels in the repository.

releases_url.description: URL to access releases in the repository.

deployments_url.description: URL to access deployments of the repository.

actor.description: The user or entity responsible for triggering the workflow run.
